verses.verse: And he brought me <S%H7725>back<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; <S%H4325>and<s%>, behold, waters issued <S%H3318>out<s%> from under the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>; (for the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> was toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>;) and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3233>under<s%>, from the right <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

Then he brought me <S%H3318>out<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and led me round by the <S%H1870>way<s%> without unto the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>; <S%H6379>and<s%>, behold, there ran out <S%H4325>waters<s%> on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%>.

When the <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%> with the <S%H6957>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and he caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were to the <S%H657>ankles<s%>.

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were to the <S%H1290>knees<s%>. Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and caused me to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, waters that were to the <S%H4975>loins<s%>.

Afterward he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>; and it was a <S%H5158>river<s%> that I <S%H3201>could<s%> not pass <S%H5674>through<s%>; for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1342>risen<s%>, <S%H4325>waters<s%> to swim <S%H7813>in<s%>, a <S%H5158>river<s%> that could not be passed <S%H5674>through<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3212>this<s%>? Then he brought <S%H7725>me<s%>, and caused me to return to the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>.
Now when I had <S%H7725>returned<s%>, <S%H8193>behold<s%>, upon the bank of the <S%H5158>river<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> trees on the one side and on the <S%H6086>other<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H4325>me<s%>, These waters issue <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward the <S%H6930>eastern<s%> <S%H1552>region<s%>, and shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>go<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall the waters go which were made to issue <S%H3318>forth<s%>; and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5315>pass<s%>, that every living creature which <S%H2416>swarmeth<s%>, in every <S%H8317>place<s%> whither the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> multitude of <S%H1710>fish<s%>; for these <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7495>thither<s%>, and the waters of the sea shall be healed, and everything shall <S%H2425>live<s%> whithersoever the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H1728>pass<s%>, that fishers shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> by <S%H5872>it<s%>: from En-gedi even unto <S%H5882>En-eglaim<s%> shall be a place for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets<s%>; their <S%H1710>fish<s%> shall be after their <S%H4327>kinds<s%>, as the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>.
But the miry <S%H1207>places<s%> <S%H1360>thereof<s%>, and the marshes <S%H7495>thereof<s%>, shall not be healed; they shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> up to <S%H4417>salt<s%>.

And by the <S%H5158>river<s%> upon the <S%H8193>bank<s%> <S%H5927>thereof<s%>, on this side and on that side, shall grow every <S%H6086>tree<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall not <S%H5034>whither<s%>, neither shall the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof <S%H8552>fail<s%>: it shall bring forth new <S%H1069>fruit<s%> every <S%H2320>month<s%>, because the <S%H4325>waters<s%> thereof issue <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall be for <S%H3978>food<s%>, and the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> thereof for <S%H8644>healing<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1454>This<s%> shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%>, whereby ye shall divide the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall have two <S%H2256>portions<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H376>it<s%>, one as well as <S%H251>another<s%>; for <S%H5375>I<s%> <S%H3027>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and this <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> unto you for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And this shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: On the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%>, unto the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H6657>Zedad<s%>;

Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, <S%H1268>Berothah<s%>, <S%H5453>Sibraim<s%>, which is between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>; <S%H2694>Hazer-hatticon<s%>, which is by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2362>Hauran<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, shall be <S%H2703>Hazar-enon<s%> at the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>; and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>. This is the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.

And the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2362>Hauran<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall be the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; <S%H996>from<s%> the north <S%H1366>border<s%> unto the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall ye <S%H4058>measure<s%>. This is the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.

And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> shall be from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> as far as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meriboth<s%> - <S%H6946>kadesh<s%>, to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H1419>Egypt<s%>, unto the great <S%H3220>sea<s%>. This is the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>.

And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> shall be the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, from the south <S%H1366>border<s%> as far <S%H935>as<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the entrance of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>. This is the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.
So shall ye <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> unto you according to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5307>pass<s%>, that ye shall divide it by lot for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto you and to the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3205>you<s%>, who shall beget <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H249>you<s%>; and they shall be unto you as the home - <S%H249>born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; they shall <S%H5307>have<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7626>pass<s%>, that in what tribe the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%>, there shall ye <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
